definitions: a person or business that sells goods to the public in relatively small quantities for use or consumption rather than for resale

examples.text: the big supermarkets have forced many independent retailers out of business

shortDefinitions: person or business that sells goods to public by retail

definitions: a person who relates the details of a story or incident to others

examples.text: as a writer I see myself as a retailer of Big Ideas

shortDefinitions: person who relates details of story or incident to others
